fileReports.summary: Generated comprehensive test suite for ConsumerWrapper with 8 test cases covering constructor validation, message reading, error handling, and disposal scenarios
recommendations: Consider adding more detailed logging in exception handling paths
Implement a more robust error handling strategy in readMessage()
Add configuration options for timeout and cancellation
keyImprovements: Null config and topic name handling
fileReports.note: Tests use Moq for mocking Kafka consumer dependencies

fileReports.summary: Generated comprehensive test suite for ProducerWrapper with 8 test cases covering constructor validation, message production, error handling, and disposal scenarios
recommendations: Consider adding dependency injection for IProducer to improve testability
Add logging mechanism instead of direct Console.WriteLine for better traceability
Implement more robust error handling and potentially add retry mechanism
fileReports.note: Tests require a running Kafka instance or mock Kafka setup for full integration testing
